file_content.text: The Dread Masters' behavior is unacceptable.
Wrath. Welcome back to Belsavis!
My lord, wonderful to see you. Welcome back to Belsavis!
Hunter. Welcome back to Belsavis! I hope business is well.
Please, come in. Welcome back to Belsavis! Such a shame about Intelligence.
It's a pleasure to see you. Welcome back to Belsavis!
The Emperor called us here, to Section X. Once a pure Rakata construction, this security block is now riddled with Republic cells.
Before you freed them, the Dread Masters were imprisoned here. Now they wage war against us. They hunt for something in Section X--something to destroy the Empire.
The Dread Masters were imprisoned here. Now they're free and wage war against us. They hunt for something in Section X--something to destroy the Empire.
Nothing the Dread Masters uncover will shield them from the Emperor's Wrath.
They're fools to defy us.
The Wrath and the guard are of one mind.
Rakata artifacts litter Belsavis. Perhaps they seek a weapon.
They're after a weapon.
That is our greatest fear.
First the Republic, now Dread Masters. You Imps sure like recruiting outside help to fight your battles.
Another war for me to win.
The Imperial Guard cannot be everywhere at once.
The Empire is weakened from our war against the Republic. We aren't equipped to do battle on two fronts.
We can't fight two wars.
We are in agreement. This uprising must be resolved quickly.
The Dread Masters served the Empire. What could have triggered their betrayal?
Why did they revolt?
Only their handler, Commander Vox, can answer that question. Sadly, he has lost his mental faculties.
A few Sith against an Empire. I think you can take them without my help.
Can't you handle this?
Imperial Guard ranks are stretched thin. We mustn't allow the Dread Masters time to gather strength.
This magnificent monstrosity is a servant of the Dread Masters. Thousands more rampage across Section X, ravaging Imperial and Republic forces alike.
Depraved warriors--Dread Guards--herd these abominations. We must end their hunt for the Dread Masters' treasure before it is too late.
The Dread Masters' servants will never complete their mission.
We will stop the Dread Guard.
With you on the battlefield, I have no doubt.
What are "Dread Guards"?
Dread Guards?
The Dread Masters' enthralled lieutenants. Twisted, deadly shadows of the Imperial Guard.
We'll never defeat the Dread Masters without an organized attack.
Where do we start?
Consult the postings in Section X. Their orders will guide your assault.
Destroy the Dread Masters' thralls. Destroy the Republic battalions that still occupy Belsavis. For the Empire!
What are the Dread Masters up to?
